name: Adge Cutler
description: '''Alan John '''"'''Adge'''"''' Cutler''' (19 November 1930 â€“ 5 May 1974) was an English singer best known as the [[frontman]] of the comic folk band [[the Wurzels]]. Cutler was known for his songs, but also his dry, [[West Country]] humour, and gained the unofficial title of "The Bard of Avonmouth".
